Podcastify is an innovative Chrome extension that transforms your browsing experience by converting webpage content into podcast scripts and reading them aloud. Whether you're researching for a project, learning about a new topic, or just exploring random news articles, Podcastify lets you absorb information hands-free, making multitasking easier than ever.

Key Features:
On-Demand Podcast Generation: Instantly create podcast scripts from any webpage with the click of a button.
Seamless Text-to-Speech Conversion: Podcastify utilizes the latest text-to-speech technology (via OpenAI) to narrate articles in natural-sounding voices.
User-Friendly Controls: Easily control playback with options to play, pause, stop, and adjust the volume directly from the popup.
Secure API Integration: Store your OpenAI API key securely through an integrated options page, ensuring that your key is safe and only accessible by the extension.

How It Works:
1. Install the Extension
2. Set Up Your API Key: Open the options page to securely enter your OpenAI API key.
3. Browse a webpage
4. Generate and Listen: Click the Podcastify icon in the toolbar, then hit "Start Podcast" to generate the script and begin playback.
5. Control Playback: Use the popup controls to manage playback, adjust the volume, and switch between different voices or script lengths.

Why Use Podcastify?
Podcastify is perfect for anyone who loves to learn on the go. Whether you're commuting, exercising, or simply prefer listening over reading, Podcastify turns information into an auditory experience, making knowledge more accessible and engaging.

Get Started Today:
Download Podcastify and revolutionize the way you consume knowledge from the web. Turn any article into a podcast and learn hands-free, anywhere, anytime.
